question: Please analyze this URL https://www.crabtree-evelyn.com/
thought: I need to start by accessing the URL to obtain a status code. The website is live and accessible. Now, I need to check for the characteristics of a scam website. Based on the extracted text, the website does not exhibit characteristics of a scam website such as unusually low prices, claims of free, or targeting human psychological weaknesses. It also does not claim to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. The website also seems to belong to an existing company and is handling common products from a known brand. The contact information and privacy notation seem appropriate for business use. The website does not exhibit any of the characteristics of a scam website. The website https://www.crabtree-evelyn.com/ is not a scam website.

answer.reason: The website does not exhibit any characteristics of a scam website such as unusually low prices claims of free targeting human psychological weaknesses or non-existent companies. The contact information seems appropriate for business use.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
